scripts.dev: bunx nodemon --ext ts --ignore dist --exec "bun run build && bun run dev:dts"
scripts.dev:dts: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist --project tsconfig.json --declaration --declarationMap false --emitDeclarationOnly true --outFile dist/index.d.ts
scripts.db:generate: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" bunx drizzle-kit generate --config drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" bunx drizzle-kit migrate --config drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:studio: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" bunx drizzle-kit studio --config drizzle.config.ts
